Admiral.Title: Maxwell Forrest
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Perform and additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

Admiral.Title: V'Las
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.
